page.title: 06Housing & community life
page.content: As might be expected in a rural environment where most people had gardens,73% had a vegtable plot and 54% owned a greenhouse. There were 12 households with swimming pools. The questions relating to peoples involvment in the community life of the area shows that a third regularly attended a place of worship and approximately the same number belonged to some local organistation,the most frequently mentioned being the W.I. Sports clubs (cricket and badminton),political groups and gardening associations were also popular. All the households surveyed had a T.V set,96% had a telephone,and 87% owned a deep-freeze. Perhaps the fact that many of the households own land accounts for the fact that of the 80% who kept pets there were in fact 48 horses.
